author: ivan
msg: serf_get: Fix counting of completed requests.
(handle_response): Increment completed_requests when request fully read.
(main): Exit when completed_requests equals to number of submitted

author: ivan
msg: Add proxy server support to serf_get testing utility.
(main): Parse '-p' option and pass it to serf. Use
serf_connection_create2() instead of serf_connection_create() to create

author: ivan
msg: Enable debug information in Windows builds of test programs.

msg: r1255: conditionally include find_apu.m4 depending on the version of APR.
